message.content: 差分みてコミットして

content.thinking: The user wants me to look at the current diff and commit the changes. Let me check the git status and diff.

input.description: Show all staged and unstaged changes

content.content:
On branch main
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/main'.

Changes to be committed:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
	modified:   flake.lock
	modified:   nix/modules/home/packages.nix
	new file:   nix/overlays/continues.nix
	modified:   nix/overlays/default.nix
	modified:   nvim/lazy-lock.json

diff --git a/flake.lock b/flake.lock
index ce375ff..bd28a1f 100644
--- a/flake.lock
+++ b/flake.lock
@@ -1247,11 +1247,11 @@
         ]
       },
       "locked": {
-        "lastModified": 1771994290,
-        "narHash": "REDACTED",
+        "lastModified": 1771998150,
+        "narHash": "REDACTED",
         "owner": "yutakobayashidev",
         "repo": "repiq",
-        "rev": "349845be36b5f31b50cb4b942f38adccf6322e2b",
+        "rev": "768a779c7129edf520bd0f9dfd1dfd3e31f4448c",
         "type": "github"
       },
       "original": {
diff --git a/nix/modules/home/packages.nix b/nix/modules/home/packages.nix
index c538dfb..d055326 100644
--- a/nix/modules/home/packages.nix
+++ b/nix/modules/home/packages.nix
@@ -6,6 +6,7 @@
     # Overlay packages
     claude-code
     ccusage
+    continues
     opencode
     vibe-kanban
     cursor-agent
diff --git a/nix/overlays/continues.nix b/nix/overlays/continues.nix
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..271f99d
--- /dev/null
+++ b/nix/overlays/continues.nix
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+final: prev: {
+  continues = final.buildNpmPackage rec {
+    pname = "continues";
+    version = "4.0.0";
+
+    src = final.fetchFromGitHub {
+      owner = "yigitkonur";
+      repo = "cli-continues";
+      rev = "819dab571c1cfd091d8812bb6d1e1da8c010f7a7";
+      hash = "REDACTED";
+    };
+
+    npmDepsHash = "REDACTED";
+
+    npmBuildScript = "build";
+
+    installPhase = ''
+      runHook preInstall
+
+      mkdir -p $out/bin $out/lib/continues
+      cp -r dist $out/lib/continues/
+      cp -r node_modules $out/lib/continues/
+      cp package.json $out/lib/continues/
+
+      cat > $out/bin/continues << EOF
+      #!/bin/sh
+      exec ${final.nodejs}/bin/node $out/lib/continues/dist/cli.js "\$@"
+      EOF
+      chmod +x $out/bin/continues
+
+      ln -s $out/bin/continues $out/bin/cont
+
+      runHook postInstall
+    '';
+
+    meta = with final.lib; {
+      description = "Resume any AI coding session across Claude Code, Codex, Copilot, Gemini CLI, Cursor and more";
+      homepage = "https://github.com/yigitkonur/cli-continues";
+      license = licenses.mit;
+      mainProgram = "continues";
+    };
+  };
+}
diff --git a/nix/overlays/default.nix b/nix/overlays/default.nix
index 8a71c03..0e8adfe 100644
--- a/nix/overlays/default.nix
+++ b/nix/overlays/default.nix
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 let
   overlayFiles = [
     ./ai-tools.nix
+    ./continues.nix
     ./dev-tools.nix
     ./difit.nix
     ./jj-desc.nix

+

+      mkdir -p $out/bin $out/lib/continues
+      cp -r dist $out/lib/continues/

+      cp package.json $out/lib/continues/
+

+      #!/bin/sh
+      exec ${final.nodejs}/bin/node $out/lib/continues/dist/cli.js "\$@"

+      chmod +x $out/bin/continues
+
+      ln -s $out/bin/continues $out/bin/cont
+
+      runHook postInstall
+    '';
+
+    meta = with final.lib; {
+      description = "Resume any AI coding session across Claude Code, Codex, Copilot, Gemini CLI, Cursor and more";

+      license = licenses.mit;
+      mainProgram = "continues";
+    };

+}

content.content:
9c8d0df feat(claude): scope commit-convention rule to yutakobayashidev repos
9254aec feat(claude): add commit convention rule, reduce WebSearch in toolchain-explainer
f2dd71d flake.lock: update anthropic-skills, brew-api, repiq
aceacbc docs(claude): update toolchain-explainer proficiency table
41589d8 chore: remove .gitkeep from claude/commands
306a695 feat(claude): add repo-creator slash command
29d768c docs(claude): add toolchain-explainer rule and translate rules to English
3bed438 flake.lock: update llm-agents (opencode 1.2.10 → 1.2.11) (#19)
ff2af6a feat: add repiq OSS metrics CLI and agent skill
77c6a7c docs(claude): add pr-aftercare rule for CI watch and review handling

toolUseResult.stdout:
9c8d0df feat(claude): scope commit-convention rule to yutakobayashidev repos
9254aec feat(claude): add commit convention rule, reduce WebSearch in toolchain-explainer
f2dd71d flake.lock: update anthropic-skills, brew-api, repiq
aceacbc docs(claude): update toolchain-explainer proficiency table
41589d8 chore: remove .gitkeep from claude/commands
306a695 feat(claude): add repo-creator slash command
29d768c docs(claude): add toolchain-explainer rule and translate rules to English
3bed438 flake.lock: update llm-agents (opencode 1.2.10 → 1.2.11) (#19)
ff2af6a feat: add repiq OSS metrics CLI and agent skill
77c6a7c docs(claude): add pr-aftercare rule for CI watch and review handling

content.thinking:
Let me analyze the changes:

1. `flake.lock` - repiq input updated
2. `nix/modules/home/packages.nix` - added `continues` package
3. `nix/overlays/continues.nix` - new overlay for `continues` CLI tool (resume AI coding sessions)
4. `nix/overlays/default.nix` - registered the new overlay
5. `nvim/lazy-lock.json` - neovim plugin updates

This is essentially two logical changes:
1. Adding the `continues` CLI tool (overlay + package registration)
2. Updating flake.lock (repiq) and nvim/lazy-lock.json (plugin updates)


Looking at the repo's commit style with conventional commits, the user asked for a single commit. I should make two commits to keep things organized—one for the `continues` feature and another for the lock file updates—following the established pattern of `feat:` for features and `chore:` for maintenance. I'll make two separate commits to keep things organized—one for the new continues overlay feature and another for the dependency updates.

content.text:
変更内容を確認しました。

- **`nix/overlays/continues.nix`** (新規) + **`nix/overlays/default.nix`** + **`nix/modules/home/packages.nix`** — `continues` CLI (AIコーディングセッション再開ツール) のoverlayを追加しパッケージ登録
- **`flake.lock`** — repiq入力の更新
- **`nvim/lazy-lock.json`** — Neovimプラグインの更新

論理的に分けて2つのコミットにします。

input.description: Unstage lock files for separate commit
